titleStmt.title: R. H. J. Goddard, Special Orders, No. 268
CWG14262

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 6

body.p:
HEAD QUARTERS, DEPARTMENT OF THE OHIO.
Cincinnati, Ohio, July 16th 1863.
SPECIAL ORDERS,
No. 268 }
6" " " " The resignation of Lieutenant Colonel W. E. Riley, 11th Regiment, Kentucky Volunteer, Cavalry, is hereby accepted to take effect on the eighteenth (18th) day of July 1863.

BY ORDER OF MAJOR GENERAL BURNSIDE.
R H J Goddard
Acting Assistant Adjutant General.

11 Cavy
Lt. Col. Riley
resig:
Filed July 23. 1863
